snippet.title: Fractured Space: "The Escape" Trailer
snippet.description:
January 2016: "The Escape" joins a shuttle flight escaping the demise of a Goliath variant Colossus in the midst of a major firefight.

Fractured Space is team-based space combat fought in gigantic capital ships. With the intensity of a shooter and the big-picture-thinking of a strategy game, Fractured Space is at the forefront of an exciting new frontier for the genre.

This Early Access trailer from January 2016 shows off some of the current ships in the game. All footage is recorded in real time from within the game engine using game assets.

For more information about the game and to take part in the Early Access program visit : http://store.steampowered.com/app/310380

Stay up to date with the latest game news : https://fracturedspace.com
https://www.facebook.com/FracturedSpace
https://twitter.com/fracturedspace

We play the game live on a regular basis, stay tuned to Twitch for details : https://twitch.tv/fracturedspace
